mapper.select: SELECT card.cardNum,cardNumFirst, cardNumSecond, cardNumThird, validityMonth, validityYear, bank FROM kickvillage.card WHERE userId = #{userId}
mapper.update: UPDATE kickvillage.card SET cardNumFirst=#{cardNumFirst},cardNumSecond=#{cardNumSecond}, cardNumThird=#{cardNumThird},cardNumFourth=#{cardNumFourth}, validityMonth=#{validityMonth}, validityYear=#{validityYear}, cardPw=#{cardPw},bank="#{bank}" WHERE userId = #{userId} AND cardNum=#{cardNum}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM kickvillage.card WHERE card.cardNum=#{cardNum} AND card.userId=#{userId}
